tidbits.title: Musical Legacy
tidbits.description: Austria has a rich musical heritage, being the birthplace of famous composers like Mozart, Beethoven, and Strauss, and is renowned for its classical music traditions.

tidbits.title: Alpine Beauty
tidbits.description: The Austrian Alps offer stunning landscapes for outdoor enthusiasts, from skiing in winter to hiking and mountaineering in the summer, showcasing breathtaking natural beauty.

tidbits.title: Cultural Capital
tidbits.description: Vienna, Austria's capital, is a cultural hub, boasting magnificent palaces, museums, and a vibrant coffeehouse culture, reflecting its historical grandeur.
